com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.logging

Class SCUICommonsLoggerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.logging.impl.Log4JLogger
      • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.logging.SCUICommonsLoggerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.commons.logging.Log

    public class SCUICommonsLoggerProvider
extends org.apache.commons.logging.impl.Log4JLogger
    SCUICommonsLoggerProvider is implementation of Commons logging's Log4JLogger. This sets YFCLogCategory in place of Log4j's logger. This class helps struts to use YFCLogCategory for logging. rasrinivasan
    See Also:
